WorkflowInfo.Name: Backup files
WorkflowInfo.Description: Copy files to a target destination with added data of date and time.
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:FileCopy;Assembly=FileCopy, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="1" TableName="ServersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="ServerName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server1</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server2</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server3</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>192.168.1.1</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" ResultSet="%ServersList%" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns2:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile2" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" /> <ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:GetDate IsValid="True" x:Name="getDate1" TimeInterval="Minutes" FuturePast="0" DateFormat="MM_dd_yyyy_HH_mm" TimeZoneName="(UTC+02:00) Jerusalem" TimeZone="120" Description="Returns the date in the specified format." DisplayName="Get Date" TypeName="GetDate" TimeToAdd="0" /> <ns5:FileCopy DstHostName="LocalHost" DstPassword="" x:Name="fileCopy1" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcUserName="" SrcHostName="LocalHost" DstPath="C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts_%getDate1%" SrcPath="C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts" Description="Copy a file from a source location to a destination location" DisplayName="Copy File" SrcPassword="" DstUserName="" TypeName="FileCopy" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process backs up a file on a group of servers by copying it to a target destination and adding time and date data to the file name.
